name: County Child Health Officer Answers Youth COVID-19 Vaccination Questions
description: Now that kids 12 and older can get a COVID-19 vaccine, they and their parents may have questions. The County’s Child Health Officer is here to provide answers.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Now that kids 12 and older can get a COVID-19 vaccine, they and their parents may have questions. The County’s Child Health Officer is here to provide answers. Get more information on the County’s COVID-19 website, where you can make an appointment and find the parental consent form.
